畢.definition: the whole of; to finish; to complete; complete; full; finished

畢其功於一役.pinyin: bi4 qi2 gong1 yu2 yi1 yi4
畢其功於一役.definition: to accomplish the whole task at one stroke (idiom)

畢典.definition: graduation ceremony (abbr. for 畢業典禮|毕业典礼[bi4 ye4 dian3 li3]); (Tw) (coll.) to graduate

畢命.definition: to die (in an accident etc); to have one's life cut short

畢婚.definition: to get married right after graduation

畢尼奧夫帶.definition: Benioff zone (geology); also called Wadati-Benioff zone

畢摩.definition: shaman among the Yi ethnic group

畢昇.definition: Bi Sheng (990-1051), inventor of movable type

畢業.definition: graduation; to graduate; to finish school

畢業證書.definition: (PRC) (since 1985) graduation certificate, which certifies that the student has graduated, but not necessarily met all requirements to be awarded a degree certificate 學位證書|学位证书[xue2 wei4 zheng4 shu1]; (1981-1985) graduation certificate, which certified that the student graduated, and, if it included a final sentence indicating a degree type, also certified that the student met all the requirements for a degree

畢竟.definition: after all; all in all; when all is said and done; in the final analysis

畢節.definition: see 畢節市|毕节市[Bi4jie2 Shi4]

畢節市.definition: Bijie, prefecture-level city in Guizhou Province 貴州省|贵州省[Gui4zhou1 Sheng3]

畢肖.definition: to resemble closely; to be the very image of; to look very much like; to be the spitting image of
